name: Look for "正"
description:
Click on more letters "正" in 1 minute. 

Aim for a high score with rivals around the world! 

Though many letters are generated randomly, the right letter is only ‘正’(sei or tada-shi, means right in Japanese). 

The more 正s and less wrong letters you click on, the higher score you can get! 

World ranking function is included. Enjoy this simple but profound game!

Made by TU, eisuke & abyss.
